mdq:check.name: Resource creator Identifier Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a resource creator identifier exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global creator
import metadig.variable as mvar
# A resource creator is not present if 'creator' not in globals() or creator is None: output = "A resource creator identifier was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
# Convert all values to unicode creator = mvar.toUnicode(creator)
# Convert all values to unicode if(isinstance(creator, unicode)): creator = [creator]
# If only a single value is returned (vs type "list"), then convert to a list # for easier processing if (mvar.isBlank(creator)): output = "The resource creator identifier is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource creator identifier is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(creator, unicode)): output = u"The resource creator identifier '{}' was found.".format(creator) elif (isinstance(creator, list)): output = u"The resource creator identifier '{}' was found (first of {} creator identifiers).".format(creator[0].strip(), len(creator))
status = "SUCCESS" return True
